name: Monstronium Demo
description:
In a struggle for absolute control over a mysteriously emerging power, the great European empires erupted into a devastating war. The conflict destroyed these empires, unleashing monstrous creatures known as the "Old Ones" into the world.

But from the ruins, the surviving Austrian Empire emerged, led by the Academy, launching a counter-attack against the Old Ones.

Our protagonist, Banfield, becomes a hunter for the Academy investigating various mysterious events related to the Old Ones after his brother Otto mysteriously disappears. One day, Banfield and his partner Nicole are sent on a secret mission to the turbulent Austrian vassal state of the Duchy of Siebenbürgen.

However, a sudden attack changes Banfield's fate. Throughout his long journey, Banfield must interact with numerous characters, gradually uncovering the layers of secrets behind the Old Ones, the Academy, and the power hidden within himself.

In this cruel world, kindness is despised, and honesty is exploited. Those who wield absolute power trample on the few remaining flowers of hope. However, even in the darkest abyss, a steadfast belief can still hear the song of the fairy and receive the smile of friendship. Gradually, Banfield's world is no longer lonely, nor indifferent.

Explore the forests ravaged by monsters, the dark and desperate underground mines, ancient ruins, and even the distant land of memories...

Highlights
• Combat is fast and easy to pick up, but still challenging to master
• Various types of enemy and Boss fight
• Story driven NPCs will join and fight along side with you
• Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, craft new equipment and items
• Traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths, puzzles and secrets abound
• Recommand use gamepad
• Perfect for Handheld PC and Steam Deck
